title: Soaring with Hawk
description: When factory worker Jester lets supervisor Hawk convince him to visit the Velvet Glove, he has no idea what to expect. Hawk treats Jester with kindness, and soon enough, Hawk wants Jester to move in and be with him for the rest of their lives. Jester's family are less than thrilled, but when he thinks he has nowhere else to go, he discovers that he'll always have a place with Hawk.Originally published on the Turn of the Screw Serial service and in the paperback volume, Velvet Glove 1.
author: Sean Michael
